segments.text: The overflowing sink captures my attention immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water cascading over the edge, pooling ominously below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems blissfully unaware, just polishing away at that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water on her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, so brazenly stealing cookies without a care!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy teeters precariously on that stool, and I can feel my heart racing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up at him with such expectant joy, it's almost sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the danger they’re in doesn’t escape me; it feels suffocating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene, to shout a warning that seems to hang in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden is so peaceful, almost mocking the chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR
